OXPQsQR8.title: Authigenic Pyrite Rods from the Core HD196A in the Northeastern South China Sea
OXPQsQR8.abstract: Authigenic pyrite is the normal product of anoxic sulfate reduction in marine sediments. Core HD196A, recovered from the seafloor of the northeastern South China Sea, has large amount of pyrites. The morphologies of pyrites are as the form of rod with hollow or not. The intervals around 500 cm of Core HD196A are enriched in authigenic pyrites, showing a rich zone of pyrites. Further studies show that the pyrite-enriched zone is consistent with the content boundaries of organic carbon, sulfate, methane and carbonate, where organic carbon, methane and carbonate increase downward, but sulfate starts to decrease sharply. The pyrite-enriched zone, combined with the content boundaries of organic carbon, methane, sulfate, and carbonate, show a sedimentary or geochemical change of Core 196A. Anaerobic methane oxidation and anoxic sulfate reduction contributed to pyrite formation, respectively. Large amount of pyrites occurrence can be a possible evidence of methane anomaly in marine sediments.

O7mekDCG.title: Trace elements and REE geochemistry of quartz veins from CCSD HP-UHP metamorphic rocks.
O7mekDCG.abstract: Trace element and rare earth element(REE)compositions of quartz veins in CCSD HP-UHP metamorphic rocks and crystals in Donghai County in Jiangsu Province were analysed by TCP-MS in this study.The results show that most of the quartz and crystal samples possess very low trace elements total contents and greatly varied Rb/Sr,Nb/Ta and Zr/Hf ratios,implying that their host metamorphic rocks were not suffered extensive and strong water-rock interactions.Rb and Cs contents in some quartz samples are very low,suggesting part of the CCSD quartz veins might have been suffered ultrahigh metamorphism.REE analyses show that all of the CCSD quartz veins and Donghai crystals have LREE enriched and HREE depleted characters,implying they were mostly derived from crust.In addition,concurrence of negative and positive Ce abnormities in CCSD quartz veins suggests that parts of protolithes of the CCSD UHP metamorphic rocks might have been weathered in an oxidative environment at the surface before plate subduction. Comparatively,N-MORB normalized trace elements patterns and chondrite normalized REE patterns of the CCSD quartz veins and Donghai erystals are quite similar to those of their respective host rocks,suggest that most of the quartz veins and the crystals derived from their host metamorphic rocks,and crust fluids released during plate subduction and exhumation might migrated at grain scale.

8zaO8tsP.title: In-situ Determination of Rare Earth Elements in Scheelite by Laser Ablation-Inductively Coupled Plasma-Mass Spectrometry
8zaO8tsP.abstract: Rare earth elements( REEs) composition and chondrite-normalized REEs patterns of scheelites can be used as an important basis to determine the genesis of deposits. In-situ determination is more conducive to analysis of ore-forming fluid evolution characteristics in terms of single minerals. REEs compositions in scheelite from auriferous quartz veins in Daping gold deposit were analyzed in-situ by Inductively Coupled Plasma-Mass Spectrometry( ICP- MS) coupled with 193 nm ArF excimer GeoLasPro laser ablation system and are reported in this paper. The results show that analysis of scheelite can yield precise and accurate data for REEs by using NIST 610 as the external standard and Ca as the internal standard. The cathode luminescence images show that the crystal composition of scheelite is relatively homogeneous. The experimental results show that they have very similar MREEs-enriched patterns with chondrite-normalized,which have very high ΣREEs( 918. 00- 2094. 97 μg / g),obvious positive anomaly of δ Eu( 1. 17- 1. 95),and no anomaly of Ce. However,the content of each element changes within a certain range,which reflects that the REEs distributions are not exactly homogeneous. Comparing the analysis results of in-situ Laser Ablation-Inductively Coupled Plasma-Mass Spectrometry( LA-ICP-MS) and solution nebulization ICP- MS,the accuracy and reliability of the in-situ LA-ICP-MS method is demonstrated for the first time. Based on all the results,routine digestion and ICP-MS analytical method provide the average contents of a bulk sample. By comparison,LA-ICP-MS has the advantages of being a rapid method with high spatial resolution( < 40 μm) and in-situ analysis,which is more important for scheelites which host an inhomogeneous rare earth elements distribution.
keywords: in-situ Laser Ablation-Inductively Coupled Plasma-Mass Spectrometric analysis

SEjzYatG.title: Chemical compositions and fluid inclusions of epidotes in Qinglongshan ultrahigh pressure metamorphic eclogite, north Jiangsu province, China.
SEjzYatG.abstract: Epidotes in Qinglongshan ultrahigh pressure metamorphic eclogites experienced four metamorphic stages; Early epidote-amphibolite facies prograde metamorphic stage (Ⅰ) , coesite-eclogite facies stage (Ⅱ) , quartz-eclogite facies stages (Ⅲ) and late amphobolite facies retrograde metamorphic stage (Ⅳ). Chemical compositions of the epidotes formed in stageⅠare characterized by the high Fe2O3contents (14. 796 - 17. 84% ) and XFe(0. 413 -0. 486), and low CaO and Al2O3. Epidotes formed in stageⅡandⅢshow continuous compositional variation. The core which was mainly formed in stage H is relatively enriched in Fe ( Fe2O3 =11. 933 -12. 993% , XFe = 0. 322 -0. 358) and depleted in CaO and Al2O3, while the rim which was mainly formed in stageⅢshows relatively low Fe concentration (Fe2O3 =9. 628 - 10. 138% , XFe =0. 275 -0. 286) and high CaO and Al2O3 contents. Epidotes formed in stageⅣpossess similar chemical composition with those of stageⅠ, and are characterized by high Fe2 O3 concentrations and XFe (0.433). Compositional variation of epidotes reflects the rapid subduction and exhumation process of Su-Lu ultrahigh pressure metamorphic belt. Three kind of Fe2+ and Mg2+ bearing aqueous inclusions have been recognized in the epidote: high-salinity (22. 5 to slightly more than 23. 2wt% NaCl) inclusions, moderate to high salinity(12.6 - 16. 0wt% NaCl)and medium salinity (6. 4 - 11. 7wt% NaCl) inclusions, which were formed in stageⅡ,ⅢandⅣrespectively. Studies of fluid inclusions in epidotes confirm that no large scale penetrative fluid flow occurred during the UHP metamorphism, and the metamorphic fluid expelled during exhumation of the Qinglongshan UHP rocks flowed mainly at grain scale.

vyXhc8Ja.title: Structural Hydroxyl of Rutile in UHP Metamorphic Rocks from Chinese Continental Scientific Drilling Project (CCSD) and Areas Nearby and Its Implication for Geodynamics
vyXhc8Ja.abstract: The research of structural water in nominally anhydrous minerals(NAMs)is significant for understand of the fluid flow activity in ultra-high pressure metamorphism,the geodynamics in convergent continental margins and the water recycling in mantle.This study focus on the structural hydroxyl concentrations of rutile in eclogites from main-hole of the Chinese Continental Scientific Drilling project (CCSD)and its areas nearby employing microscope Fourier infrared spectroscopy(FTIR)with unpolarized light.The rutile grains all exhibit a single sharp band at near 3285 cm~(-1)or 3295 cm~(-1),which is the structural hydroxyl(OH~-)absorption band,indicating water is structurally incorporated in rutiles. Calculating with the molar absorption coefficient[38000 L/(mol·cm~2)]of Maldener et al.(2001)shows that the“water”contents in rutiles are 324 to 523×10~(-6),which is greatly lower than the previous researcher's result calculated with the molar absorption coefficient[3270 L/(mol·cm~2)]of Hammer et al., (1991).The inhomogenous distribution of OH~- in rutile is shown not only in different samples but also in the different micro-areas in the same grain,indicating that the fluid flow activity in ultra-high pressure metamorphism is limited and slabe subduction and exhumation are quick.

Fvoor2Jr.title: Overviews on the Features of the Remanufacturing Mechanics Products and the Current Remanufacturing Technologies
Fvoor2Jr.abstract: As a technology used for promoting the sustainable development,remanufacturing technology now becomes an important part and developing trend of the advanced manufacturing technology.According to the domestic and international research and application situation,this paper indicates that it has two features :first,an appreciable utilization value,second,an failure model that surface damage under a dynamic loading condition,and it describes the difference among remanufacturing,maintenance and recycling,and briefly introduces the main remanufacturing process,finally,the current remanufacturing technology such as arc spraying technology,nano-depositing Technology etc.are emphatically introduced also.Through summarizing the domestic and international research and application situation,the features of the remanufacturing products and the current remanufacturing technology,it indicates that the current mainly remanufacturing technologies are "adding remanufacture ","reducing remanufacture" and "replacing remanufacture",and it is also indicated that attention are paid to the functional parameter while the material performance is ignored during the evaluation of the performance of the remanufacturing products.

Rw2E8iE7.title: Influence of Fatigue Damage Accumulation on Refabrication of Engine Cylinder Head
Rw2E8iE7.abstract: By means of fatigue test,the S-N curves of new and used engine cylinder heads were compared.It was found that the fatigue lives had an obvious contrast between new and used materials in the case of a large stress amplitude,while in a small stress amplitude,the difference between them was very little.It can be concluded that the damage degree of engine cylinder head after refabrication will become serious along with the increase of stress amplitude.In a word,as the result of damage accumulation,the engine may have a hidden trouble of safety after refabrication.

kcE695fs.title: Cracking Analysis of External Pressure Stainless Steel Bellows Expansion-joint
kcE695fs.abstract: External pressure axial type bellows expansion joint of austenitic stainless steel cracked after using for short time.The cracking reason was analyzed by means of chemical composition analysis,metallographic examination and fracture analysis.The results showed that superheated steam of working medium in the expansion-joint contained corrosive chloride ions,and the expansion-joint was affected by tensile stress,which resulted in stress corrosion cracking.

IOpKaHcQ.title: Research on the Material Damage to Hydrogenation Reactor Caused by Over-high Temperature for a Short Time
IOpKaHcQ.abstract: Through a serious of tests of mechanical properties,impact property,fracture toughness and microstructure on 2.25Cr1Mo steel,the material damage of hydrogenation reactor caused by over-high temperature for a short time is investigated.Test results show that after over-high temperature for a short time with 860 ℃,strength and hardness enhance,plastic and impact toughness reduce obviously while fracture toughness remains to some extend.It is concluded that reactor's safe run would not be influenced under the normal operating conditions.

N86Ldasl.title: PLASTIC LIMIT LOAD EQUATIONS OF DEFECT FREE ELBOWS SUBJECTED TO IN-PLANE BENDING MOMENT
N86Ldasl.abstract: Elastic-plastic behavior of elbows with various geometric parameters and under various bending modes were investigated by 3-dimensional(3D) non-linear finite element(FE) analysis,assuming material behavior was elastic-perfectly-plastic and taking geometric nonlinearity into account.The influences of geometric parameters and bending mode on plastic carrying capacities were studied systemically,and closed form equations of plastic limit loads for uncracked elbow involving effect of tangent pipes were also obtained.Non-linear finite element(FE) analysis indicates that,the influences of geometric nonlinearity on plastic carrying capacities are significant;elbow exhibits dramatically different behaviors at the elastic-plastic states when subjected to in plane opening bending moment and closing bending moment,and the plastic limit load values are varied obviously under both of the bending modes;the ratio of wall thickness and the cross-section radius is the most significant influence factor on plastic carrying capacities of elbow,followed by the bending mode.

ay3NfFKs.title: Corrosion Research of 304 Stainless Steel in High Temperature Naphthenic Acid
ay3NfFKs.abstract: Based in high temperature autoclave,the corrosion behavior of 304 stainless steel in different total acid number(TAN) range(0.3~15 mgKOH/g),different temperature(220~320 ℃),and different velocity(0.6~3.5 m/s) are studied,with the mixture of transformer oil and purificatory naphthenic acid.Test results indicate that the corrosion rate has no definite relationship with TAN,but it rises with contents of the highly corrosive naphthenic acid.Then the corrosion rate rises as the temperature increased.And we also know that naphthenic acid corrosion(NAC) rate of 304 stainless steel increases linearly with the fluid velocity.

7jqB9T61.title: Analysis on Failure Models of Remanufacturing Cores and Their Products
7jqB9T61.abstract: This paper overviews the development and application of remanufacturing technology at domestic market and abroad.According to a lot of investigations to the remanufacturing factories and analysis to the failure models of the remanufacturing cores and their products,it is concluded that the main failure model of remanufacturing cores and their products is the surface damage under a dynamic loading condition.

iKbo2yA6.title: Influence of Multiple Heat on the Performance of Matrix Material during Times of Remanufacture
iKbo2yA6.abstract: The influence of heating during remanufacture on the performance of matrix material was discussed.45 steel which was generally used in automobile crankshaft was tested in the experiment.Mechanical properties and expansion coefficient were measured respectively on hot-rolled steel and slack quench steel with and without 0.2%plastic deformation.Results showed the strength,plastic property,metallurgical structure and expansion coefficient did not change a lot after multiple heat process in all specimens.So the influence of limited multiple heat process on the matrix material of remanufacture blank could be neglected.The adding remanufacture method made neither additional damage nor improvement on the original performance of the matrix material

EMW9qPWB.title: Clinical study on human kallikrein gene 5 messenger RNA expression in breast cancer
EMW9qPWB.abstract: Objective The purpose of the current study was to develop a real-time quantitative reverse transcription-PCR method for detection of human kallikrein gene 5(KLK5) mRNA expression,quantify the expression of KLK5 mRNA in malignant and benign breast tissues,and statistically analyze whether KLK5 expression levels correlate with clinicopathologic variables in the patients with breast cancer.Methods Paired breast tissue samples from cancerous and corresponding noncancerous tissues were obtained from 48 patients with breast cancer who underwent surgical resection.The relationship of KLK5 mRNA expression status with various clinicopathologic variables were quantitativly analyzed by real-time RT-PCR.Results KLK5 mRNA expression in cancerous tissues was decreased in 38 of 48(79%) breast cancer patients compared with normal counterparts.The mean expression level of KLK5 mRNA in cancerous tissues was significantly lower than that in noncancerous tissues(P<0.01).The levels of KLK5 mRNA in cancerous tissues of patients with node metastasis were higher than those without metastasis.The levels of KLK5 mRNA were higher in cancerous tissues of patients who were in stage III and IV than those in stage I and II,but were lower in the cancerous tissues with positive estrogen receptor(ER) than those in the tissues with negative ER(P< 0.01).There was no correlation between KLK5 expression and age,pathologic type or PR status(P>0.05).Conclusion The results of this study indicated that KLK5 mRNA expression was significantly lower in cancerous tissues than that in noncancerous breast tissues,and low expression of KLK5 mRNA correlated with TMN stage,metastasis and ER status.

2b8omnW2.title: Relationship Between Leptin and Neuropeptide Y Levels in Patients with Different Kinds of Tumors
2b8omnW2.abstract: Objective To investigate the relationship between leptin and neuropeptide Y (NPY) levels in patients with different kinds of tumors. Methods Serum leptin and plasma NPY levels were between with RIA in 180 patients with different kinds of tumors and 30 controls. Results ① Leptin levels were statistically higher in patients with gastric cancer (n=38), liver cancer (n=30), esophageal carcinoma (n=38), colon carcinoma (n=32) and lung cancer (n=42) than those in controls (4.18±0.51ng/ml) (P<0.01, P<0.05, P<0.01, P<0.01, P<0.05). Plasma NPY levels in controls were (150.25±20.33)pg/ml. NPY levels were significantly higher in the patients (except patients with liver cancer than those in controls). ② Leptin levels were positively correlated with NPY levels in patients with gastric cancer. Esophageal carcinoma and colon carcinoma (r=0.354, 0.30, 0.285, P<0.01). Leptin levels were also positively correlated with TG in patients with gastric cancer, liver cancer, esophageal carcinoma and colon carcinoma (r=0.301, 0.268, 0.335, P<0.01). There were no correlations between leptin and TC, LDL-C, HDL-C levels. Conclusion ① There were high leptin and NPY blood levels in patients with gastric cancer, liver cancer, esophagesl carcinoma, colon carcinoma, and lung cancer. ②Leptin and NPY might play important roles in the development of tumor cachexia through their abnormal synthesis, secretion and receptor binding.

0VEBQ4a4.title: Significance of Changes of Expression of IL-18Rα on CD4~+T Cells in Patients After Renal Transplantation
0VEBQ4a4.abstract: Objective To study the clinical significance of changes of expression of IL-18Rα on CD4+ cells in patients after renal transplantation. Methods Expressions of IL-18Rα on peripheral CD4+ cells were determined with flow-cytometry in 33 patients after renal transplantation dynamically on the day before operation, d7 and d14 as well as once in 30 controls. Results The expressions of IL-18Rα on CD4+ cells in the patients before operation were significantly higher than those in the controls (P<0.01). Post-operatively, both on d7 and d14, the levels of expression in the six patients with acute rejection were significantly higher than those before operation (P<0.01). However, in the 27 patients without acute rejection, the expression levels were significantly higher than the preoperative levels only on d7 (P<0.01), but dropped to preoperative levels by d14 (P>0.05). Conclusion Th1 type immune-response was dominant in the patients as shown by the pre-operative higher-than-control levels of IL-18Rα expression. persistent increased expression of IL-18Rα post-operatively by d14 might indicate the development of rejection.

j5am9vIW.title: Effects of estrogen and progestogen on the expression of KLK5 mRNA in human ovarian cancer cell and cell proliferation
j5am9vIW.abstract: Objective To investigate the effects of estrogen and progestogen on the expression of KLK5 mRNA in human ovarian cancer cell line HO8910. Methods HO8910 cells were incubated and divided into three groups: the test groups with 17-βE2 or progesterone(P) at different concentration(called 17-βE2 group or P group),and the control group with ethanol for 72 hours,respectively.By using real-time fluorensence quantitive RT-PCR the expression of KLK5 mRNA in the three groups were measured. And the cell proliferation was measured by 3-(4,5-dimethlthiazol-z-yl)-2,5-dipheny tetrazolium blue(MTT) colorimetric assay.Results The expression of KLK5 mRNA in HO8910 cells in 17-βE2 group was higher than ethanol control group(P<0.01) at a dose-dependent way. While in progesterone group expression level of KLK5 mRNA was decreased(P<0.01).And MTT test showed the cell absorbance value of HO8910 cells in 17-βE2 group was significantly increased,while decreased in progesterone group. Conclusion Estrogen can up-regulate the expression of KLK5 mRNA and stimulate HO8910 cell proliferation,while progesterone act just oppositely.

Emrh8Rln.title: Characteristics of complex chromosomal rearrangement in Chinese male carriers and its impact on male fertility]
Emrh8Rln.abstract: To analyze the characteristics of complex chromosomal rearrangement (CCR) in Chinese male carriers and its influence on male fertility.Using the G band technique, we conducted karyotype analysis on the peripheral blood lymphocytes of 1,625 Chinese males with reproductive problems. We also searched CNKI and Wanfang database for CCR-related literature published between January 1984 and November 2013, followed by statistical analysis on the CCR characteristics and reproduction-related data of the CCR carriers.Two CCR carriers were found among the 1,625 males and another 47 cases identified from the databases. Among the 49 CCR carriers, there were 17 three-way exchange cases (34.7%), 17 double two-way exchange cases (34.7%), and 15 exceptional cases (30.6%), with no statistically significant differences in the incidence of the three types (P > 0.05). Azoospermia- or oligospermia-induced infertility was found in 19 (38.8% ) of the CCR carriers. A total of 87 pregnancies were achieved in the other 30 (61.2%), among which spontaneous abortion occurred in 75.9% (66/87), dead fetus and malformed infant death in 9.2% (8/87), and phenotypically normal offspring in 14.9% (13/87). Recurrent abortion was associated frequently with breakpoints on CCR-involved chromosomes 6, 7, 8, 11, and 16, while dyszoospermia mostly with breakpoints on CCR-involved chromosomes 10 and 14. The breaking occurred more than 3 times at 1p22, 1q25, 2q31, 5p13, 5q35, 6q23, 8q13, and 20p13. Moreo- ver, the breakpoints at 2q31, 5q35, and 8q13 were particularly related to recurrent abortion, while that at 1p22 only to dyszoospermia.CCR is extremely rare. Male CCR carriers are often identified through reproductive problems and have high risks of infertility and abnormal pregnancy and a very low rate of normal newborns. In addition, chromosomes and breakpoints involved in CCR may affect the fertility of male CCR carriers, and some particular chromosomal breakpoints may play a key role in gametogenesis.

OS5l0B9X.title: Relationship Between Serum Aldosterone and Plasma Endothelin-1 Levels in Patients with Ischemic Cerebrovascular Disease or Coronary Heart Disease
OS5l0B9X.abstract: Objective To observe the relationship between serum aldosterone(Ald) and plasma endothelin-1(ET-1) levels in patients with ischemic cerebrovascular disease(ICVD) or coronary heart disease(CHD).Methods The diagnostic criteria for ICVD and CHD were baced upon WHO and related national approved definitions.Serum Ald and plasma ET-1 levels were detected with radio immunoassay in 93 ICVD patients,103 CHD patients,and 42 controls.Results ①Ald level was significantly higher in all ICVD and CHD patients with highest levels in high blood pressure(HBP) group.Ald level increased in the order:HBP>Vertebrobasilar insufficiency(VBI)>acute cerbral infarction(ACI)>CHD>sequela of cerebral infarction(SCI).②ET-1 levels were also significantly higher in all ICVD and CHD patients.ET-1 level increased in the order:HBP>ACI>CHD>VBI>SCI.③Linear regression analysis showed that Ald and ET-1 levels were positivly correlated in ICVD patients(r=0.459,P<0.01),also in HBP(r=0.561,P<0.01),and CHD(r=0.20,P<0.05) patients.Conclusion Ald and ET-1 played important roles in the development of ICVD and CHD.Ald and ET-1 may serve as parameters in evaluation of the damage of cardia-cerebrovascular disease.

PAf39S7s.title: Detection and application of platelet-associated immunoglobulin
PAf39S7s.abstract: Objective To observe the clinical significance of detection of platelet-associated immunoglobulin (PAIgG).Methods Flow cytometry was used to detect PAIgG in 42 idiopathic throbocytopenic purpura (ITP) patients, 39 aplastic anemia (AA) patients, 21 patients with other autoimmune diseases and 20 normal controls. Rate of inefficient platelet infusion was calculated.Results Percentage of PAIgG positive in ITP, AA and other autoimmune diseases was higher than that in normal controls (P<0.01). Rate of inefficient platelet infusion in PAIgG positive ITP and AA patients was higher than that in PAIgG negative patients (P<0.01; P<0.05).Conclusion PAIgG is a sensitive but not specific parameter for ITP diagnosis. PAIgG is related to inefficient platelet infusion, and an important cause for inefficient platelet infusion.

q7yZrabe.title: Expression of CD_(44) in patients with nephrotic syndrome and its clinical significance
q7yZrabe.abstract: Objective To study the expression of adhesion molecule glycoprotein(CD_(44)) in children with primary nephrotic syndrome(NS) and its clinical significance.Methods The expression of CD_(44) in peripheral blood was detected in 28 children with NS by flow cytometry,controlled by 20 cases of healthy children.Results The CD_(44) expression level of NS in active stage was significantly higher than that of the control(P<0.01),and the CD_(44) level in patients with nephrotic type NS was significantly higher than that of the simple type NS(P<0.05).The CD_(44) expression of patients with NS in remission stage significantly decreased,and was positively related with 24h urine protein and negatively with serum albumin(r=0.596,r=-0.482,P<0.05).Conclusion The expression of adhesion molecule CD_(44) is increased in peripheral blood of children with NS,which may play an important role in the progress of glomerular disease.

BauhZu2u.title: Clinical Significance of Increased Serum IL-6 and TNF-α Levels in Elderly Subjects with Osteoporosis
BauhZu2u.abstract: Objective To study the relationship between the serum levels of IL-6,TNF-α and bone r-carboxyglutamic acid protein(BGP) in elderly subjects with osteoporosis.Methods Serum IL-6,TNF-α and BGP levels were measured with RIA in 40 elderly patients with osteoporosis,40 elderly subjects with decreased bone density but not to the degree of osteoporosis(i.e.decreased bone mass),35 aged controls(above 60) and 35 younger controls(below 45).Results By definition,the bone density in patients with osteoporosis was significantly lower than that in all other groups(P<0.05~0.01) and the bone density in subjects with decreased bone mass only was also significantly lower than that in younger controls(P<0.01).The serum IL-6 and TNF-α levels in patients with osteoporosis were significantly higher than those in all controls(P<0.05~0.01),especially in advanced cases,while the BGP levels were significantly lower.Conclusion Serum IL-6,TNF-α and BGP levels could be used as indicators of the degree of osteoporosis.

hPpAdpst.title: Expression of UbcH10 in Colorectal Cancer Detected with Real-time Fluorescent Quantitative PCR
hPpAdpst.abstract: Objective To investigate the expression of UbcH10 in colorectal cancer (CRC) tissues,and to explore its potential usefulness for the diagnosis of CRC. Methods The UbcH10 cDNA was obtained with RT-PCR method with total RNA extracted from the tissue. The expression levels of UbcH10 in human malignant colorectal carcinoma tissues and their surrounding normal tissues in 45 patients with CRC were detected with real time quantitative RT-PCR. Results The expression levels of UbcH10 mRNA were increased significantly in human malignant colorectal carcinoma tissues than those in surrounding normal tissues (P<0.01),and the average levels of gene expression in colorectal cancerous tissues were more than ten times of those in surrounding normal tissues (0.0802±0.0907 vs 0.0079±0.0088,P<0.01). Exceptional overexpression of UbcH10 (>20-fold) was observed in 17/45 cases. Conclusion UbcH10 is overexpressed in CRC,and it may be a useful tool in the diagnosis of colorectal cancer as well as potential target for treatment.

GydHTNe4.title: Advances in the Relationship between Tumor Necrosis Factor α and Obestity
GydHTNe4.abstract: Obesity is an endocrine metabolic disease. It has been a worldwide health concern. TNF-α is a pleiotropic cytokine which plays important role in the development of obesity. In obese individual, the concentration of plasma TNF-α is higher, and the excessive expression of TNF-α is also detected in adipose tissue. TNF-α can affect the glucose metabolism, lipid metabolism and inflammation to control the obesity. In this paper, the effect of TNF-α on the development of obesity were reviewed here.

WiwN7kfq.title: Analysis of cAMP and cGMP in hematopathy patients
WiwN7kfq.abstract: Objective:To figure out the concentration change of cAMP and cGMP in the peripheral blood of the patients of with leukemia and aplastic anemia. Method:ELISA was used to detect the concentration of cAMP and cGMP. Result:Compared with control,cAMP concentrations in all three groups including leukemia before chemotherapy group(white B group),leukemia after chemotherapy group(white P group) and aplastic anemia group(red group)decreased dramatically,with significant statistical difference(P<0.05).The concentration of cGMP in white P group markedly increased compared with control with significant difference(P<0.05).The cAMP/cGMP in white B group,white P group and red group all markedly decreased compared with control with significant difference(P<0.05). Conclusion:The results indicated that the concentration change of cAMP,cGMP in peripheral blood could be related to pathogenesis of leukemia and aplastic anemia.

alLkfyMA.title: Expression of IL-18Rα on Peripheral Blood T Cells in Pediatric Patients with Mycoplasma Pneumoniae Pneumonia
alLkfyMA.abstract: Objective To investigate the significance of IL-18Rα expression on peripheral blood(PB) T cells in children with mycoplasma pneumoniae pneumonia(MPP).Methods Peripheral blood T cell subsets CD3/CD4/CD8 and expression of IL-18Rα on CD4+ and CD8+T cells in 35 children with MPP and 30 age-and sex-matched controls were determined with flow cytometry.Results The CD3+ percentage in patients with MPP were significantly lower that in controls(P<0.05).The CD4+/CD8+ ratio in 51.4% of the MPP patients was out of the normal range of 1.0~1.9.During acitestage,the expressrons of IL-18Rα on CD4+ and CD8+ T cells in MPP patients were significantly higher than those in controls(P<0.01).During convalescence,the expressions dropped markedy(vs acute stage,P<0.05).but still remained significantly higher than those in controls(P<0.05).Among the 51.4% of the total MPP patients with abnormal distribution of T cell subsets,the IL-18Rα expression on both CD4+ and CD8+ cells were significantly higher than those in patients with normal T cell distribution type(P<0.01),while the expressions in patients with normal T cell distribution type were not significantly different from those in controls(P>0.05).Conclusion Peripheral blood Th1/Th2 imbalance was demonstrated in pediatric patients with MPP and Th1 response was dominant during acute stage.

PGoKxLGt.title: Clinical Study of Human Kallikrein Gene 7 Messenger RNA Expression in Breast Cancer
PGoKxLGt.abstract: Objective Recent studies have found that many kallikreins have altered expression patterns in various malignancies and several KLKs are promising biomarkers of prostate,ovarian,testicular,andbreast cancers.Human kallikrein gene 7(KLK7) is a member of the human kallikrein gene family,The purpose of the current study was to develop a real-time quantitative reverse transcription-PCR method for detection of human Kallikrein Gene 7(KLK7) mRNA expression,quantify the expression of KLK7 mRNA in malignant and benign breast tissues and to statistically analyze whether KLK7 expression levels correlate with clinicopathologic variables in patients with breast cancer.Methods Paired breast tissue samples from cancerous and corresponding noncancerous tissues were obtained from 48 patients with breast cancer who underwent surgical resection.Quantitative analyses of KLK7 mRNA expression were done using fluorescence quantitative RT-PCR.Relationship between KLK7 expression status and various clinicopathologic variables was analyzed.Results There was no difference in expression level of KLK7 mRNA between cancerous tissues and noncancerous tissues(P>0.05).Levels of KLK7 mRNA in cancerous tissues of patients with node metastasis were higher than that without metastasis;higher in cancerous tissues of patients in stage Ⅲ-Ⅳ than that in stage Ⅰ-Ⅱ;lower in ER positive cancerous tissues than ER negtive tissues.There was no relation between KLK7 expression and age,pathology type or PR status(P>0.05).Conclusion The results of this study indicated that KLK7 mRNA expression was correlated with TMN stage,metastasis and ER status.

SYH1RE9P.title: Evaluation of rituximab on purgation and mobilization of peripheral blood stem cells in patients with B-cell non-Hodgkin lymphoma
SYH1RE9P.abstract: Objective To investigate the effect of rituximab on purging peripheral blood stem cells and mobilization in patients with B-cell non-Hodgkin lymphoma(NHL). Methods Eight B-cell NHL (stage Ⅲ/Ⅳ)patients received the combination mobilization program composed of high-dose cyclophosphamide (HD-CTX), granulocyte colony-stimulating factor(G-CSF) and rituximab (375 mg·m-2·d-1, on d-1 and d7) after 4 to 6 courses of induction and/or consolidation chemotherapy (CHOP or CHOP-like) ± rituximab. Adverse reactions related to rituximab, the period of myelosuppression, complications, the PBSC harvest time and quantity, and the tumor marker genes in harvests were evaluated. Results Only one patient occurred mild erythra in the mobilizing courses. Leukaphereses were started on (11.6±1.0)d after the end of chemotherapy and adequate mononuclear cells (MNC) could be obtained in median of 2(1～3) times harvest procedures. The mean numbers of MNC and CD+34 cells harvested separately was (3.4±1.0)×108/kg, (3.6±1.7)×106/kg. Five patients accomplished auto-peripheral blood stem cells transplantation (APBSCT), IgH/TCR shifted to negative in three patients, and remained negative in one after APBSCT. Four patents were still in disease free survival; one relapsed at 3 months after APBSCT. Conclusion The addition of rituximab did not compromise the collection efficiency in non-Hodgkin lymphoma patients. Rituximab could potentially purge the graft of occult CD+20 tumor cells.

WipwnTiw.title: Relationship between Human Kallikrein Gene 5 Messenger RNA Expression in colorectal tumor and Clinicopathologic variables
WipwnTiw.abstract: Objective To quantify the expression of KLK5 in malignant and benign colorectal tissues and to statistically analyze whether KLK5 mRNA expression levels correlate with clinicopathologic variables.Methods Paired colorectal tissue samples from cancerous and corresponding noncancerous tissues were obtained from 51 patients with colorectal cancer who underwent surgical resection.quantitative analyses of KLK5 mRNA expression were done using real-time quantitative reverse transcription-PCR.Results KLK5 mRNA overexpression in cancerous tissues compared with normal counterparts was observed in 33 of 51 (67%) patients.Elevated KLK5 expression was significantly correlated with lymphonode metastasis and advanced Duke's stage(P<0.05).Conclusion The results of this study indicated that KLK5 expression was significantly higher in cancerous than in noncancerous colorectal tissues,and high expression of KLK5 mRNA correlated with lymphonode metastasis and advanced Duke's stage.

IihOVePc.title: Expression of IL-18Rα on CD4+ T cells from children with Mycoplasma pneumoniae
IihOVePc.abstract: Objective To investigate the significance of IL-18Rα expression on CD4+ T cells in peripheral blood (PB) of children with Mycoplasma pneumoniae pneumonia (MPP).Methods T cell subtype CD3/CD4/CD8 and expression of IL-18Rα on CD4+ T cells in PB from 35 children with MPP and 15 age- and sex-matched control subjects was determined by flow cytometry.Results Compared with that of healthy control, CD3+ and CD4+ positive cells in MPP children were decreased (P< 0.01 ).Both in acute-stage and convalescence MPP IL-18Rα+/CD4+ expression were higher than healthy controls (P<0.01, P<0.05). IL-18Rα+/ CD4+ expression in convalescence MPP was deceased and lower than that of in acute-stage MPP (P<0.05). IL-18Rα on CD4+ T cells from MPP patients with abnormal T subtype were significantly higher (P<0.01) than those in normal T subtype patients. There was no difference between MPP patients with normal T subtype and healthy control (P>0.05).Conclusion There exists cell-mediated immune function disorders and Th1/Th2 imbalance in children with MPP. Th1 immune response is dominant in acute-stage MPP.

K9AOQddv.title: The Value of Vein Assessment In The Chemotherapy of Leukemia
K9AOQddv.abstract: Objective To investigate the value of vein assessment in the chemotherapy of leukemia.Methods Select the appropriate blood vessel,the puncture site and puncture tool according to the patient's age,peripheral vascular,coagulation mechanism,stimulant medication and so on,and evaluate the rates of drug extravasation and phlebitis.Results Among the 180 patients,ordinary steel needle was adopted for 52 patients,intravenous catheter was adopted for 69 patients,peripherally inserted central catheter was adopted for 17 patients,and central venous catheter was selected for 42 patients.Drug extravasation occurred in 4 patients and phlebitis occurred in 5 patients;the incidence rates were significantly less than that of control group(P<0.05).Conclusion Venous assessment is important to reduce the incidence of drug extravasation and phlebitis.

8ogUQw3g.title: Clinical Significance of Serum Interleukin-8 Expression in Patients with Different Kinds of Malignancy
8ogUQw3g.abstract: Objective To investigate the clinical significance of serum interluekin 8(IL-8)expressions in patients with different kinds of malignant tumor.Methods Serum IL-8 levels were detected with RIA in 201 patients with different kinds of cancer(carcinomu of lung,n=32 clolo-rectal cancer,n=35 breast carcinoma n=28 ovarian carcinoma n=20 gastric carcinoma n=38 esophageal carcinoma n=28 and hepatic carcinoma n=20)and 38 controls.Results Serum IL-8 levels were significantly higher in all patients with cancer(especially in colorectal cancer 1.332±0.798ng/ml),lung cancer(1.105±0.710ng/ml),and liver cancer(1.013±1.052ng/ml)(P<0.01;P<0.05)than those in controls(0.346±0.105ng/ml).The positive rates(above 0.451±1s)of IL-8 in the cancer patients were all above 50%.Conclusion IL-8,acting as an autocrine growth factor and angiogenesis factor,could enhance collagenase Ⅳ activity and influence tumor cell adherence and migration,result in accerlating tumor growth and metastasis.

tPtHjtKr.title: Effects of Zhixinkang capsule on inflammatory cytokine in serum of apoE-gene knockout mice
tPtHjtKr.abstract: [Objective] To investigate the effects of Zhixinkang capsule on inflammatory cytokine when treating atherosclerosis.[Methods]The serum levels TNF-α and IL-1β in ApoE-gene knockout mice were measured by ELISA.[Results]Serum levels of TNF-α and IL-1β were lower in Zhixingkang capsule group than that of model group (P <0.01). Serum levels TNF-α and IL-1β were higher in model than that of control group (P <0.01). There was no difference in serum levels TNF-α and IL-1β between Zhixingkang capsule group and controls (P >0.05). [Conclusion]Zhixinkang capsule can improve status of vascular endothelia cell through lowering blood fat and eliminating inflammation, and has good effects in preventing and curing the formation of atherosclerotic plaque in ApoE-gene knockout mice.

IiilGdNz.title: Correlation of hK6 expression with clinicopathological features and prognosis in epithelial ovarian cancer]
IiilGdNz.abstract: To approach the relationship between the expression of hK6 in ovarian neoplasm and clinicopathological variables and prognosis in ovarian cancer patients for finding a new tumor marker of the ovarian cancer.The expression of hK6 was detected by immunohistochemistry in 19 cases of benign, 11 cases of borderline and 45 cases of malignant ovarian neoplasms and statistically analyzed whether its expression correlate with clinicopathological variables and prognosis in patients with ovarian cancer.The expression of hK6 in ovarian cancer tissues (60.0%) was significantly higher than that in the benign (15.8%) and borderline (27.3%) ovarian neoplasm tissues (P < 0.01). The expression of hK6 in higher-grade ovarian cancer tissues (68.4% ) was higher than that in low-grade ones (14.3%, P < 0.05). The expression of hK6 in late-stage (stage III, 76.7%) was significantly higher than that in early-stage (stage I or II, 26.7%, P < 0.01). The expression of hK6 was significantly higher in patients with lymph node metastasis (77.8%) than that in patients without (33.3%, P < 0.01). The expression of hK6 in the cancer tissues in the patients died, or with reccurence or metastasis within 3 years after surgery was higher (75.0%) than that in the patients with stable disease (42.9%, P < 0.05).The expression of hK6 in ovarian cancer was higher than that in benign and borderline ovarian neoplasms. The expression of hK6 is higher in the ovarian cancer of late stage, higher-grade, with lymph node metastasis and is associated with a poorer prognosis. hK6 may become a new markers in prediction of prognosis of the patients with ovarian tumors.

xUQZbhl2.title: Regulation of estrogen on the expression of KLK6 mRNA and protein in human breast cancer cell line MCF-7
xUQZbhl2.abstract: AIM:To investigate the effects of estrogen and tamoxifen on the expression of KLK6 mRNA and protein(hK6) in human breast cancer cell line MCF-7.METHODS: MCF-7 cells were incubated with 17-βE2 and tamoxifen at different concentrations for 72 hours,respectively.The expression levels of kallikrein 6(KLK6) mRNA and protein were evaluated by fluorescence quantitative RT-PCR and flow cytometry,respectively.RESULTS: Compared with ethanol control,KLK6 mRNA expression levels were significantly decreased when 17-βE2 was added at concentrations of 10-10 and 10-8 mol/L(P<0.01).No statistical change was observed when 17-βE2 was at 10-12 mol/L(P>0.05).Flow cytometry showed the same results.The average fluorescence intensity(AFI) that represents the level of hK6 was decreased after incubated with 17-βE2(P<0.01).After incubation with tamoxifen,the levels of KLK6 mRNA and hK6 were increased(P<0.01).CONCLUSION: Estrogen down-regulates the expression levels of KLK6 mRNA and protein(hK6),while tamoxifen has an opposite effect.

CDyWi43Y.title: Clinical Value of Detection of Serum Platelet-Associatcd Immunoglobulin
CDyWi43Y.abstract: Objective To observe the clinical significance of detection of serum platelet-associated immunoglobulin(PAIgG).Methods Flow cytometry was used to detect serum PAIgG in 42 patients with idiopathic throbocytopenic purpura(ITP),39 patients with aplastic anemia(AA),21 patients with other autoimmune diseases and 35 controls.Percentage of inefficient platelet infusion was calculated.Results Positive rates of PAIgG in ITP,AA and other autoimmune diseases were higher than that in controls(P<0.01).Percentages of inefficient platelet infusion in PAIgG positive ITP and AA patients were higher than those in PAIgG negative patients(P<0.01,P<0.05).Conclusion PAIgG is a sensitive but not specific marker for ITP diagnosis.PAIgG positive is an important cause for inefficient platelet infusion.

DtH1zRBa.title: Research Progress on the Prevention of Chemotherapeutic Phlebitis
DtH1zRBa.abstract: We reviewed current literatures to introduce overview,definition,main symptoms,and typing standard of chemotherapeutic phlebitis,introduced the progress of drugs for prevention of chemotherapeutic phlebitis both at home and abroad,so as to find safer and more effective methods to manage chemotherapeutic phlebitis based on the present study.

OnFR3HNA.title: Study on Apoptosis of the Hepatocytes in p21~(HBsAg/HBsAg) Transgenic Mice with Flow Cytometry
OnFR3HNA.abstract: Objective To observe the apoptosis in the livers of p21~(HBsAg/HBsAg) transgenic mice.Methods The liver of p21~(HBsAg/HBsAg) transgenic mice(6,12, 18,24 months) and corresponding p21~(+/+) mice were assessed by flow cytometry.Result\ The apoptosis rate of the hepatocytes in p21~(HBsAg/HBsAg) transgenic mice was lower than that of wild mice of the same months.Conclusion\ HBsAg can inhibit apoptosis in liver cells of p21~(HBsAg/HBsAg) transgenic mice.

zNv65uSM.title: Effects of UbcH10 expression on proliferation of colorectal cancer cells
zNv65uSM.abstract: Objective To investigate the effect of the UbcH10(Ubiquitin-conjugating enzymes) expression on the proliferation of colorectal cancer cells.Methods The pcDNA3.1-UbcH10 and pcDNA3.1 were transfected into LoVo cells.UbcH10 expression was determined by Western blot.Proliferation of LoVo cells was detected by CCK-8 kit.The effect of UbcH10 on the cell cycle of colorectal cancer cells was assessed by flow cytometry.Results The UbcH10 expression in LoVo cells transfected with pcDNA3.1-UbcH10 was more obviously increased than that in control cells.Over-expression of UbcH10 obviously promoted cell proliferation compared with the controls.UbcH10 over-expression significantly decreased cell cycle distribution in the G2-M phase(P <0.05).Conclusion UbcH10 can promote proliferation of colorectal cancer cells.The potential mechanism may depend on its regulation of the cell cycle.

uHTckFZ3.title: An Intervention Study on Reproductive Health Services among the Employees of Public Entertainment Centers——Taking Changsha as an Example
uHTckFZ3.abstract: This research discusses the intervention model of reproductive health services for entertainment centers through family planning service network.The employees were a group of high-floating young people,and they were lack of knowledge on reproductive health and did not fully understand the ways of STD/AIDS prevention,but had an open value towards sex;some of them were involved in commercial sex activities and had become a high-risk bridge population transmitting STD/AIDS.The survey has discovered the intervention emphases and apposite working manner for further reproductive health services.

mUgOeI08.title: A Study On the Family Planning Service Mechanism and Transition in Rural China
mUgOeI08.abstract: The development of family planning services and its shift in rural China is investigated by using case study method.The results indicate that the family planning service expansion and shift occur by multiple factors,which are much related to the local status on population development,material and child health,public health resources and social-economic development.The financial input towards family planning services should be improved to institutionalize a reliable assurance for service shift and sustainable development.A family-based strategic guidance framework for the quality services of family planning/reproductive health/family health care should be established.The current family planning service system should be promoted to be a public service system for population and family health in rural China.

DVji72TD.title: An Analysis on Reproductive Health Status and Service Demands among the Middle-age and Elderly Women in Rural China
DVji72TD.abstract: This paper describes and analyses the reproductive health status and service demands based on a sampling survey among middle-age and elderly women in rural China. The results of the questionnaire survey showed that they were lack of perinatal health care when they were young,and lack of awareness and knowledge on woman's menopause and reproductive health;more than half of them were puzzled with the menopause syndromes,gynecological diseases and sex problems;about one fourth of them had not have IUD removed after their menopause.There were no special services for them so that their reproductive health status was seriously affected.The paper proposes a basic consideration and operation framework on reproductive health promotion focused on menopause period for middle-age and elderly women in rural China.

BXEY0lCq.title: Family planning service development in rural China
BXEY0lCq.abstract: To explore the new situation of China's rural family planning technical service system and its development,we selected typical nine counties(cities,districts) in China's eastern,central and western areas,which have better sustainable development of family planning.We used these nine counties' records as our research data.We used unified statistical tables to collect various population and family planning data,technical service data,the development of institutions and personnel data,revenue data and other data of the local(cities,districts) of family planning service stations from 1999 to 2008 before we conducted the corresponding quantitative analysis.The study found that with the reduction in the number of women of childbearing age,the current four basic services for families cannot meet the needs of the rural families.Therefore,planning services and development must be integrated into the rural public health reforms to expand and improve the service quality.The ultimate goal of the construction of family planning services in rural areas is to integrate the current population and family health services into the public service system.

kUD7Cadb.title: Case Study on Unmarried Workers' Sexual Behavior in A Large Entertainment Center of An Eastern City,Jiangsu Province
kUD7Cadb.abstract: Use anonymous questionnaires to investigate 489 unmarried workers in a large entertainment center of an eastern city in Jiangsu province.The paper explores their sexual behavior status and analyses unsafe sexual behavior related factors.The study shows that the participants practiced many unsafe sexual behaviors,the percentage of pre-married sexual behavior among them was higher than other groups,"unsafe sexual behaviors" were significantly related to their migrant status but "using condom and having multiple sexual partners" were not statistically related to their AIDS knowledge and attitudes.

IQVuyI9O.title: Study on the Birth Defects Status and the Scientific Intervention Strategies in Jiangsu Province
IQVuyI9O.abstract: This paper analyzes the current situation and development trend of birth defects in Jiangsu province based on literature review,with a case study method focused on birth defects intervention and management diagnosis.The results show that the birth defect incidence rate in Jiangsu is below the national average in recent years,but the current birth defects intervention model reveals lack of effective guidance and coordination mechanism between departments,lack of long-effect operation mechanism,lack of service resources and service capacities.The health education and health promotion are needed to be strengthened.A long-term cooperation mechanism at provincial level should be established for further improving the birth defects monitoring system and improving the capacities of the service personnel and institutions.

hciUEFMp.title: Inspirations from the Project to Strengthen Capacity Building in Reproductive Health and Family Health Care Service in Central and West China
hciUEFMp.abstract: The China/Japan cooperative project to strengthen capacity building in reproductive health and family health care service in central and west China,based on its successful practice in China's rural areas,threw out the following significances: having explored effective ways for population and family planning network to provide rural public service;having promoted the innovation in the system and mechanism of population and FP work;having drove forward the construction of professional work force,reflecting the idea of national overall planning for addressing population issues;having showed the importance and effect of international cooperative project.

9Zw4AXD9.title: Analysis on mental health status and effect factors in floating women in Jiangsu
9Zw4AXD9.abstract: Objective:To understand the mental health status and effect factors in floating woman living in Jiangsu.Methods:1 178 floating population(including 729 floating woman) in Jiangsu were surveyed by SCL-90 and Social Support Rating Scale.Results:The total score,average scores of somatization,anxiety,hostility,horror and psychotic factors in floating women were higher than those in Chinese general population norm,and there was significant difference in average scores of somatization,horror and psychotic factors between floating women and Chinese general population norm(P<0.001).The total score and average scores of all factors in floating women were higher than those in floating men except crankiness factor,there was significant difference in average scores of somatization,interpersonal sensitivity,anxiety horror and total score between floating women and floating men(P<0.05).The effect factors of mental health in floating women were daily working time,employee contract signing or not,objective support,job hunting,degree of life satisfaction,temporary job and no work intention.Conclusion:Floating women have some psychological problems.

FNcy0hTZ.title: On Reproductive Health Education of the Young Adult Employees in Entertainment Centers in Kunshan:Based on a Baseline Survey
FNcy0hTZ.abstract: A baseline survey was conducted on education of reproductive health among the young adult employees in entertainment centers in Kunshan. The results showed that the group of people changed their workplace frequently; they were lack of knowledge on reproductive health and health protection; they did not fully understand STD/AIDS prevention, but had an open value towards sex; they were sexually active with a large number of them often having unprotected sex behavior with multiple sexual partners. Some of them were involved in commercial sex activities and had become a high-risk bridge population transmitting STD/AIDS.

36pymOT5.title: Analysis on Characters of Groundwater Pollution and Water Supply for Human and Livestock in the Polluted Area in the Downstream of Zihe River
36pymOT5.abstract: In the polluted area of the downstream of Zihe River,water supply for human and livestock depend on groundwater.Since 1980s,the watercourse has accepted the polluted water from the upriver,the surface water and shallow ground water have been polluted,and the middle and deep groundwater appeared pollution too last years.The polluted belt distributes along the Zihe River with width about 1.0 - 1.5 km,and the most serious polluted belt is within 500 meters from the banks.The shallow groundwater is not suitable for drinking in the belt.The middle and deep groundwater quality is better and can be used for living,except for a few wells polluted slightly by the tube damage resulting in the aquifers mixing up.The quality and the quantity of the middle and deep groundwater are enough for the need of the water supply until 2010 locally.We'd better exploit the groundwater in different layers based on the characters of the polluted water and hydrogeology characters of the middle and deep aquifers in order to prevent the pollution caused by the aquifers mixing,and protect the valuable groundwater resource.
keywords: water supply for human and livestock

taoMQRzL.title: Analysis on the Water Supply Prospect of the Emergency Water Source in the Major Cities of North China
taoMQRzL.abstract: North China is one of the regions which are highest level of underground water resource development and utilization in China. Groundwater exploitation quantity in this region accounted for more than 50% of the whole country, the development and utilization rate reached 54.3%. Since 1990s, northern areas have continued dry weather, water shortages has become an important constraint of affecting the socio-economic development, especially copping with various of unexpected incidents and ensuring urban water supply security which have become the urgent affairs. Based on the regional hydro-geological conditions in North China, present status of groundwater development and utilization, the balance of groundwater exploitation and recharge, the author analysis and summarize water supply conditions and prospect of 85 emergence urban groundwater source that are elected and planted to build in this area, which has important strategic significance for the protection of the water supply security in major cities of North China.

qJLUoFwA.title: Discussion on Ground Water Research and Geo-environment Research in Circum-Bohai-Sea Region,China
qJLUoFwA.abstract: The Circum-Bohai-Sea Region occupies an important position at the stratagem of economic development in China.But it is under the circumstance that the water sources are becoming shorter and shorter and geological disasters are becoming dangerous.So the reasonable application of the groundwater and effective protection of geological environment are of important component part for the social and economic sustainable development in the Circum-Bohai-Sea Region.The paper profoundly discussed the further working orientation for the ground water resources and geo-environment investigation in the region based on the present ground water resource and major geo-environment problems around the social-economic development need in the region.It is recommended that ground water resource investigation emphatically put on the regions where coordinate to exploitation arrangement and the aquifer;fully develop and apply the shallower aquifer;use the coastal valleys to set up the ground water banks(reservoirs);apply ground space and flood water resource in order to connect surface water with ground water and confidingly manage both of them;expand the use of salt water resource: carry out the research and set up city's water source in emergence(reserve);strengthen the monitor system for dynamics of ground water;set up the ground water supply system with security and guarantee for cities and ports.We should be focused on the datum line of coast zone,and on the major cities ports and wetlands in the geo-environmental research work;set up the geo-environment monitor system and geological disaster alarm system;set up geo-environmental guarantee system for the coastal zone.

Ycp1Mx1o.title: Vulnerability evaluation of the Caofeidian coastal area based on coastal vulnerability index method
Ycp1Mx1o.abstract: It is important to understand the degree of vulnerability for sustainable development and disaster prevention in coastal areas.Based on index system including six factors and take the storm surge disaster as an example,this paper examines and evaluates the vulnerability degree of the Caofeidian coastal area.Two kinds of determination weight methods are used to compare the reliability of the vulnerability degree.The results show that the vulnerability of the coastal area is gradually reduced from near-shore to inland;serious vulnerable district and relative vulnerable district mainly occur in the nearshore area,from the Jianhe estuary to the Luannan third saltern and from the Gaoshangpu saltern to the Daqinghe saltern.Storm surge disaster risk and land subsidence rate are the two most important indicators among the index system which may affect the vulnerability of the Caofeidian coastal area.

o3BcB6JJ.title: Exploring Ways of Socialized Service of Public Geological Exploration Work—Taking Caofeidian Project as an Example
o3BcB6JJ.abstract: This paper introduces the project of environmental geological survey and evaluation in the coastal zone of Caofeidian,Hebei province. It points out that this project, based on the requirements, has been organized and implemented effectively. Through the combination of professional technology and service, the work deployment has been optimized. The special and staged achievements were timely summarized and compiled during the implementation of projects, so the achievements have been successfully applied to the regional planning and construction of Caofeidian. At the same time, the working tactics, such as "grasping the status quo, making predictions and make suggestions" has made the geological survey work playing an important role in rational use of geological resources, the adjustment of major project planning and construction and environmental function zoning. Moreover, geological environment information service platform of three-dimensional visualization was built successfully. The mechanism of "interaction of supply and demand" has been explored; and the consciousness of active service has always been carried out the total process of project operation. While a mechanism of regular meetings with the administrative departments of planning and construction has been built, the link between supply and demand, as well as the platform for supply and demand of communication have also been established.
keywords: interaction of supply and demand mechanism

slg5397t.title: Research on Environmental Geology Mapping in China Coastal Zone
slg5397t.abstract: The 1/4 000 000 environmental geological map comprehensively reflects the regional geological environment basic characteristics,the main environmental geological problems and geological disasters,nearshore hydrological conditions and human engineering-economic activity intensity of china coastal zone.This paper states the basic principles,drawing boundary,main contents and shows methods and environmental geology subarea of China coastal zone.

oAV9d6xF.title: Application of R-mode Analysis on Chemical Characters and Influential Factors of Quaternary Groundwater in Caofeidian Area
oAV9d6xF.abstract: The hydrochemical characters of groundwater were analyzed based on 28 samples taken from Caofeidian area in December,2008.Meanwhile,the R-mode factor analysis method was utilized to recognize the four factors affecting groundwater quality seriously.The shallow groundwater is characterized by high salinity and a chemical type of Cl-Na,and the deep groundwater is characterized by a horizontal zoning.The shallow groundwater with high salinity is mainly influenced by the evaporation and medium with high soluble salt and the deep groundwater is influenced by the soluble salt in aquifers and recharge water with high carbonate.At the same time,NH+4,NO-3 and NO-2 detected in deep groundwater reflect the impacts of human activities,such as agricultural production and human sewage.

Hs6CrVLh.title: Static cone penetration test study of soft soils after vacuum preloading in Huanghua port area
Hs6CrVLh.abstract: The static cone penetration test formula for vacuum preloading foundation in soft soil area has never reported in China. Through years of practice in Huanghua Lough, a set of static cone penetration test formula has been obtained for vacuum preloading foundation in soft soil area by researching on the correlativity among cone point resistance, physico-mechanical indexes in 11 projects. The set of formula has important reference sense to calculate the foundation bearing capacity, modulus of compressibility, undrained shear strength, ultimate side resistance of pile, and to assess the character of vacuum preloading foundation in soft soil area.

JBCJ4kC0.title: Character and Prevention Strategies of Sea(Saline) Water Invasion in Circum-Bohai-Sea Region
JBCJ4kC0.abstract: The basic character,the main manner,process of development and influencing factor of sea(saline)water intrusion are explained in this paper.General prevention strategies of sea(saline) water intrusion are presented.There are four manners of sea(saline) water intrusion including plane,zonal,nervation or arborization and leaky of groundwater in study area.Foundation condition of arising sea(saline) water invasion are climate,landform,geology and hydrological geology factor.Main reasons of placing a premium on sea(saline) water invasion are irrational human engineering and economic activities,for example,over-mining of ground water and so on.To prevent the development of sea(saline) water intrusion,we need adjust industrial structure,build a water-saving society system use natural environment rationally,create the project of stopping seawater intrusion and storing fresh groundwater,transfer water across valley and construct monitoring system.

KeF6taw6.title: Discussion on Establishing Mechanism for Socialized Service of Geological Investigation Data——A Case Study of the Project with Regard to Investigation and Assessment of Geological Environmental Safeguard in the Process of Caofeidian Regional Development
KeF6taw6.abstract: This paper introduces the main practices which has been done for the project with regard to investigation and assessment of geological environmental safeguard in the process of Caofeidian regional development,these include: in light of local economic and social sustainable development and major project planning and construction requirements to carry out the practical experience explanation for entire course of socialized service;enhancing social service of geological survey data at every stage;continuously promoting service capability and level is the important reflect for geological survey work to integrate more closely with national economic construction and social development.And then,this paper proposes some specific methods which the geological survey work can serve the national economy and social development on every side and at every stage: further strengthening the social service of geological data;improving service mode;updating service content and level.

DKOSxThS.title: THE CORRELATION BETWEEN THE AVERAGE REFLECTANCE OF CASE Ⅱ WATER IN CAOFEIDIAN OFFING AND THE CONCENTRATIONS OF SURFACE SUSPENDED PARTICULATE MATTER
DKOSxThS.abstract: Numerous spectroradiometric measurements were carried out in the Caofeidian offing and,on such a basis,correlation was made between the average reflectance and the concentrations of surface suspended particulate matter(SPM).The empirical relationships were established between remote-sensing reflectance(Rrs) in TM-HRV bands and SPM concentrations.The results show that the remote-sensing reflectance increases with SPM concentrations.When the SPM concentrations are lower than 20 mg/L,the amplitudes of remote-sensing are wider in the 570 nm than in the 670 nm,but when the SPM concentrations are higher than 20 mg/L,things are just the opposite.The best correlations are obtained for Rrs(TM3) and SPM concentrations,which show remarkable exponential correlations.As a result,SPM concentrations within the surface waters in Caofeidian offing are estimated with an average accuracy better than ±28%.

E8XJlrXS.title: A Tentative Discussion on Headwaters for Emergency Water Supply in the Major Cities of the Bohai Sea Rim
E8XJlrXS.abstract: Based upon the analysis on the situation of supply and demand of regional water resources,the paper puts forward the basic principles for establishing headwaters for emergency water supply in the major cities of the Bohai Sea Rim.In the light of hydrogeologic condition,the state of underwater exploitation,and technical conditions of exploitation,the paper makes a comprehensive analysis on location selection of headwaters for emergency water supply and conducts a rough evaluation for 33 intend selected headwaters,which provide basis for further investigating headwaters for emergency use..

9ZB0an4g.title: Development and Utilization Prospect of Groundwater Reservoir in Circum-Bohai-Sea Region
9ZB0an4g.abstract: The feasibility of building groundwater reservoir in Circum-Bohai-Sea region of China is analyzed from recharge water source, hydrogeology, environmental geology, eco-environmental effects, economic profit and so on. The feasible groundwater reservoir can be compartmentalized into four types: coastal river valley type, intermountain basin(river valley) type, alluvial and flood plain(fan) type and ancient riverbed of alluvial plain type. And the regulating ability of groundwater reservoir and the newly enhanced exploitation quantity of groundwater have been appraised in the paper. As a result of the analysis and appraisement it is revealed that along the coastal area of Liaoning and Shandong there are 35 sites of coastal river valley type suitable to build groundwater reservoirs with total reservoir capacity of 28.85×108 m3 and newly enhanced groundwater allowable exploitation quantity of 2.60×108 m3, and in Jiaodong peninsula there are 4 sites of intermountain river valley plain type suitable to build groundwater reservoirs with total reservoir capacity of 1.22×108 m3 and newly enhanced groundwater allowable exploitation quantity of 0.24×108 m3. At present, there are 8 places of groundwater reservoir of coastal river valley type that have been built in this region, which have enhanced the allowable exploitation quantity of groundwater of 2.89×108 m3 and brought notable economical, social and environmental profits. Therefore, it is very important in Circum-Bohai-Sea region for solving shortage of water resource, improving water quality, and preventing seawater invasion to construct groundwater reservoirs in the coastal river valley area.

IwIz9Nvu.title: Phosphate Capacity Control in Caofeidian Coastal Area
IwIz9Nvu.abstract: A tidal flow and pollutant transport mathematical model was first established and verified by the measured data.Then,phosphate concentrations under six hydrological conditions(spring,middle and neap tides in the flood season;and spring,middle and neap tides in the dry season) were computed by this verified mathematical model,and the comparisons were made between the computed phosphate concentration at the boundary of the mixing zones and corresponding water quality standards.At last,the allowed discharge amount and cut rate of phosphate at outfalls were calculated.The research results show that the phosphate concentrations at the mixing zone boundaries of Douhe and Shahe rivers exceed their allowed standard values in the dry season,and the exceeding concentration occur in Shuanglonghe mixing zone and reclamation area in the flood season.The phosphate discharge amount from Douhe and Shahe rivers in the dry season and Shuanglonghe in the flood season must be cut down.

Ivgxyp0C.title: Evaluation Research on Bus Livery Design Based on Fuzzy Semantics
Ivgxyp0C.abstract: Based on the research of fuzzy semantics for livery design, a design evaluation method using 2D coordinate of fuzzy semantics was established. Semantics differential method was adopted to examine the design projects according to semantic characteristic and fuzzy semantics coordinate. A quantitative evaluation model was established to quantify the semantic characteristic of design projects. In the case study of electric bus livery design, the efficiency of fuzzy semantics coordinate method was verified in related field.

yjyTTXjW.title: Study on Inspection of Food Borne Pathogens in the Retail Chicken Product
yjyTTXjW.abstract: Microbial inspection and quality analysis of the retail chicken products were studied in the paper.According to the inspection results of the five kinds of chicken products and 20 samples of four chicken markets in Laiyang,the total amount of bacteria of five kinds of the retail chicken products was smaller than 10 6 cfu/g,which had not gone beyond the standard.2 strains of Salmonella and 2 strains of Arizona were examined,the detectable rate was separately 10%.The pollution of E.coli was relatively serious with examining 17 pieces in the 20 products,the detectable rate was 85%.Analyzing from the results of inspection,the quality of the chicken products in the supermarkets was better than the products in the markets of farm product.The quality of the packaging chicken was better than the products of retailing in bulk.The quality of chicken's wing was the best in five kinds of chicken products,chicken's claw was the most serious in pollution.

1xNoyFel.title: Research on prediction chemical composition of beef by near infrared reflectance spectroscopy
1xNoyFel.abstract: This study established a near infrared reflectance spectroscopy models for exactly predicting the fat, protein and moisture of the ground and mince beef on line. Using our country' SupNIR-1000 near infrared spectrometer, the models were set up by artificial neural network (ANN). Related coefficient of calibration (r(c)) of fat model of mince was 0.971 and related coefficient of prediction (r(p)) was 0.972. The protein' r(c) and RP were 0.952 and 0.949, respectively. The moisture' r(c) and r(p) were 0.938 and 0.927, respectively. Using ground beef established models, the fat' r(c) and r(p) were 0.935 and 0.810; the protein' r(c) and r(p) were 0.954 and 0.868; the moisture' r(c) and r(p) were 0.930 and 0.913, respectively. So near infrared reflectance spectroscopy can better detect the fat, protein and moisture of mince than ground beef. But basically the ground beef model also can be used to quickly predict the chemical composition on line.

bFq2XCq4.title: Research of forecasting models of beef tenderness established by the L~*,a~*,b~*color space
bFq2XCq4.abstract: For quickly selection of high-quality beef,colors of fattened bull and culling cow cuts which had been aged for 24 hours to 48 hours were measured by colorimeter.The results show that the differences of meat colors and tenderness between bull and cow were significant(p<0.05).Each forecasting model was significant.24 beef cuts were used to test the forecasting models,there are no significant differences between forecasting values and measured ones(p<0.05).The results show that each model has high reference value in forecasting beef tenderness.

ljDYUlXE.title: Analyzing Nutrients and Physicochemical Index of Beef Carcass Cuts
ljDYUlXE.abstract: Ten Horqin oxes with 24 months old were selected.The Nutrients,tenderness,pH and objective color of blade bolar,chuck tender,blade oyster,neck,highrib,ribeye,striploin,tenderloin were measured.By statistical analysis,the results showed that protein,fat,moisture,tenderness,pH and a*,respectively,were affected by different location(P<0.05).L* and b* were not affected by cuts(P>0.05).Protein,fat,moisture,tenderness and objective color of blade bolar and blade oyster were almost the same as middle high-grade cuts',no significant difference(P>0.05),and the values of these cuts should be excavated.

Eks6gAZS.title: Improving the Technics of Japanese Hamburger
Eks6gAZS.abstract: Japanese hamburger has lots of advantages with low fat,high protein and special flavor,it's a kind of nutrition equilibrium food.There's almost no such product in our country right now,so it has a good prospect.This paper was based on the study of traditional Japanese hamburger,through adding soybean tissue protein and sodium tripolyphosphate.This method would enhance the content of protein,improve tissue construction and water holding capacity of hamburger.At last,we made sure the optimum content,soybean tissue protein was 17% and sodium tripolyphosphate was 0.13%.

ClugF5G8.abstract: This paper summarizes the connotation and significance of the customer relationship management introduced by the library in the circumstance of the knowledge service, and puts forward library's management mode based on the customer relationship management.

kviBJRc0.abstract: The library services evaluation is an important part of library management.This paper uses value engineering method to evaluate the library services,measure the value conditions of every branches,optimize the departments and reasonably distribute resources,in order to provide valuable advices for library services.

48Bc1X3S.abstract: The analysis of the university-library individuality information service covers the connotation and significance of the university-library individuality information service in an age of knowledge economy.And then a further attempt is made to analyze the problems existing in the fulfillment and application of an individuality-based information service.

vBcX1Los.abstract: Being led by TALIS,the university library union in Tianjin has its characteristics. Yd0Dr4tm.title: Task-oriented Second Language Learners' Vocabulary Acquisition through Reading
Yd0Dr4tm.abstract: Based on experiments,this paper discusses three techniques designed to increase the chances that will influence second language learners' vocabulary acquisition through reading.The experiment shows that word relevance to the reading task,pre-reading test announcement,post-reading vocabulary task will influence second language learners' vocabulary acquisition.It suggests second language learners' vocabulary acquisition through reading can be enhanced by some kinds of tasks,which will help the students to process the target words elaborately and finally acquire the words.

lsRQGSmR.title: A Review of Second Language Vocabulary Acquisition Research
lsRQGSmR.abstract: This review surveys research on second language vocabulary acquisition. It discusses several issues closely related to vocabulary teaching, including the definition of vocabulary knowledge, vocabulary testing, modes of vocabulary development, learning strategies, several influences on vocabulary acquisation, and incidental and intentional learning. The article attempts to promote the development of Chinese vocabulary acquisition research and provide a reference for teaching Chinese vocabularies to foreign students .

x6mytYUR.title: International Promotion of the Chinese Language and Study on Language Standard
x6mytYUR.abstract: In the process of international promotion of Chinese,the focus of Chinese teaching has been shifted from China to foreign countries.The main problem in international promotion of Chinese lies in standard competition.This paper is intended to make a study on the establishment of the Chinese language standard based on the language teaching standard of European Union,America and Canada in order to provide reference for constructing the Chinese language performance standard.

gNnZMhT6.title: A Study on Vocabulary Level in the Background of International Promotion of Chinese
gNnZMhT6.abstract: In international promotion of Chinese,an important step is to bring Chinese teaching in line with international language teaching standard.America and European Union have proposed a series of new standards for foreign language teaching.Under this situation,it is worth discussing how to stipulate vocabulary levels related with communicative activities and tasks on the basis of the current Chinese proficiency vocabulary syllabus so as to cultivate comprehensive communicative ability.In establishing vocabulary level,we should take into consideration of language communication,difference between receptive vocabulary and productive vocabulary and combine vocabulary level with language function,which is of great practical value for promotion of Chinese.
